comment: Configuration data for the Alexa Space/X Info skill

lang.Welcome: Welcome, I can tell you about space ex. say Help for more information about what you can ask me to do. Note that I am not affiliated with space ex in any way.
Hi there, I can tell you all about space ex. say Help for more information about what you can ask me to do. By the way, remember that I am not connected to space ex in any way.
